translations: n.婉转曲折的说法，累赘的陈述；遁辞

sentences.sentence: Morgan is an expansive stylist, fond of rare words (“letheless, ” “mortise”) and of the circumlocutions that can pass for plain speaking, but her pacing is shrewd.
sentences.translation: Morgan是一名胸襟广阔并且追求独特风格的作家，喜欢罕见字（“letheless”，“mortise")，并且喜欢迂回的能够通过普通说话表现出来的说法，但是她的节奏敏锐。
